paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician upon Neginah, A Psalm of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician upon Neginah, A Psalm of David.

paragraphs.content: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.

paragraphs.content: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
paragraphs.contentHtml: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.

paragraphs.content: For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy.

paragraphs.content: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.

paragraphs.content: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.

paragraphs.content: Thou wilt prolong the king’s life: and his years as many generations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou wilt prolong the king’s life: and his years as many generations.

paragraphs.content: He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare mercy and truth, which may preserve him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare mercy and truth, which may preserve him.

paragraphs.content: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.
paragraphs.contentHtml: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.
